Class King

java.lang.Object
engine.forPiece.Piece
engine.forPiece.King
public final class King extends Piece
The King class represents a king chess piece with specialized movement and castling capabilities. Kings move one square in any direction and are the most important piece on the board, as their capture results in checkmate. This class handles standard king movement, castling rights, and maintains state information about whether the king has moved or castled.

Kings can participate in castling moves under specific conditions, including unmoved status, clear paths to rooks, and absence of check. The class precomputes legal move patterns for efficient move generation and validates edge cases for board boundaries.

Author:
Aaron Ho

  • Field Details

    • CANDIDATE_MOVE_COORDINATES

      private static final int[] CANDIDATE_MOVE_COORDINATES
      An array of coordinate offsets representing all possible one-square king moves in eight directions.

    • PRECOMPUTED_CANDIDATES

      private static final Map<Integer,int[]> PRECOMPUTED_CANDIDATES
      A precomputed map storing legal move offsets for each board position. Keys represent tile coordinates and values contain arrays of valid destination offsets, accounting for board edge restrictions.

    • isCastled

      private final boolean isCastled
      Indicates whether this king has completed a castling move.

    • kingSideCastleCapable

      private final boolean kingSideCastleCapable
      Indicates whether this king retains the right to castle kingside.

    • queenSideCastleCapable

      private final boolean queenSideCastleCapable
      Indicates whether this king retains the right to castle queenside.

  • Constructor Details

    • King

      public King(Alliance alliance, int piecePosition, boolean kingSideCastleCapable, boolean queenSideCastleCapable)
      Constructs a King with specified alliance, position, and castling capabilities. This constructor assumes the king has not moved and sets the move count to zero.
      Parameters:
      alliance - The alliance (color) of the king.
      piecePosition - The initial position of the king on the board.
      kingSideCastleCapable - Whether the king can castle kingside.
      queenSideCastleCapable - Whether the king can castle queenside.

    • King

      public King(Alliance alliance, int piecePosition, boolean isFirstMove, boolean isCastled, boolean kingSideCastleCapable, boolean queenSideCastleCapable)
      Constructs a King with complete state information including move and castling status.
      Parameters:
      alliance - The alliance (color) of the king.
      piecePosition - The current position of the king on the board.
      isFirstMove - Whether this is the king's first move.
      isCastled - Whether the king has completed a castling move.
      kingSideCastleCapable - Whether the king can castle kingside.
      queenSideCastleCapable - Whether the king can castle queenside.

  • Method Details

    • computeCandidates

      private static Map<Integer,int[]> computeCandidates()
      Precomputes and returns legal move offsets for each board position. This method calculates valid king moves for all 64 squares, excluding moves that would place the king off the board or violate edge constraints.
      Returns:
      A map containing precomputed legal move offsets for each board position.

    • isCastled

      public boolean isCastled()
      Returns whether this king has completed a castling move.
      Returns:
      True if the king has castled, false otherwise.

    • isKingSideCastleCapable

      public boolean isKingSideCastleCapable()
      Returns whether this king retains the right to castle kingside.
      Returns:
      True if kingside castling is possible, false otherwise.

    • isQueenSideCastleCapable

      public boolean isQueenSideCastleCapable()
      Returns whether this king retains the right to castle queenside.
      Returns:
      True if queenside castling is possible, false otherwise.

    • calculateLegalMoves

      public Collection<Move> calculateLegalMoves(Board board)
      Calculates and returns all legal moves for this king on the given board. This includes standard one-square moves and capturing moves, but excludes castling moves which are handled separately by the player classes.
      Specified by:
      calculateLegalMoves in class Piece
      Parameters:
      board - The current board state.
      Returns:
      A collection of legal moves for this king.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns the string representation of this king piece.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      The piece type string representation.

    • locationBonus

      public int locationBonus(Board board)
      Calculates the positional bonus for this king based on its current board position. The bonus value is determined by alliance-specific evaluation tables.
      Specified by:
      locationBonus in class Piece
      Parameters:
      board - The current board state.
      Returns:
      The location bonus value for this king's position.

    • movePiece

      public King movePiece(Move move)
      Creates a new King instance representing this king after executing the given move. The new king will have updated position and status information based on the move type.
      Specified by:
      movePiece in class Piece
      Parameters:
      move - The move being executed.
      Returns:
      A new King instance reflecting the post-move state.

    • equals

      public boolean equals(Object other)
      Compares this King with another object for equality. Kings are equal if they have the same basic piece properties and castling status.
      Overrides:
      equals in class Piece
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      True if the objects are equal, false otherwise.

    • hashCode

      public int hashCode()

    • isFirstColumnExclusion

      private static boolean isFirstColumnExclusion(int currentCandidate, int candidateDestinationCoordinate)
      Determines whether a move from the given position with the specified offset would be excluded due to first column boundary constraints.
      Parameters:
      currentCandidate - The current position of the king.
      candidateDestinationCoordinate - The move offset being evaluated.
      Returns:
      True if the move should be excluded due to first column constraints, false otherwise.

    • isEighthColumnExclusion

      private static boolean isEighthColumnExclusion(int currentCandidate, int candidateDestinationCoordinate)
      Determines whether a move from the given position with the specified offset would be excluded due to eighth column boundary constraints.
      Parameters:
      currentCandidate - The current position of the king.
      candidateDestinationCoordinate - The move offset being evaluated.
      Returns:
      True if the move should be excluded due to eighth column constraints, false otherwise.
